183E4540.Line7.101CF8: Perhaps the body was one of those that I sent out to search for the fragments too...I must regretfully hope for that. To think that another might hold it is terrifying.

3FBA9B7E.Line5.101CF8: We cannot risk that a bear totem be used with ill intent, not with all that we have already seen.

6736F1BC.Line3.101CF8: This part fits onto the first bit that you brought me. I believe it is the carving of a bear. Even though we are still missing the head, the shape of the legs and body are clear enough.

8EB347FA.Line1.101CF8: Perhaps if you are to find the last piece, you should hunt the bears themselves. Using only part of a totem could have caused a flawed transformation.
